definitions.definition: a piece of equipment or furniture that is fixed in position in a building or vehicle.
articles attached to a house or land and considered legally part of it so that they normally remain in place when an owner moves.
examples: the hotel retains many original fixtures and fittings

definitions.definition: a person or thing that is established in a particular place or situation.
examples: palm readers were a fixture in most '40s nightclubs
synonyms: permanent feature; informalpart of the furniture "she's a fixture at the bar"

definitions.definition: a sports event that takes place on a particular date.
